BusFlow
  • Views
  • View page source

Views

The views package contains Flask blueprints that handle HTTP requests, interact with controllers, and render templates. Each view module corresponds to a specific portal or functionality.

Landing View

Landing page view for the BusFlow application.

This module defines the routes for the public landing page that introduces the BusFlow platform to visitors.

module:

app.views.landing

app.views.landing.index()[source]

Render the landing page.

Displays the main marketing page with information about the BusFlow platform and links to the different portals.

Returns:

Rendered landing page template

Return type:

str

Authentication View

Authentication views for the BusFlow application.

This module defines the routes for user authentication including login, registration, and logout functionality.

module:

app.views.auth

app.views.auth.login(portal_type)[source]

Handle user login for a specific portal.

GET: Display the login form POST: Process login credentials

Parameters:

portal_type (str) – Type of portal (user, driver, admin)

Returns:

Rendered template or redirect

Return type:

str or Response

app.views.auth.register()[source]

Handle user registration (passengers only).

GET: Display the registration form POST: Process registration details

Returns:

Rendered template or redirect

Return type:

str or Response

app.views.auth.logout()[source]

Log out the current user and redirect to landing page.

Returns:

Redirect to landing page

Return type:

Response

User Portal View

User portal views for the BusFlow application.

This module defines the routes for the passenger portal including bus search, seat selection, booking management, and ticket cancellation.

module:

app.views.user_portal

app.views.user_portal.dashboard()[source]

Render the user dashboard with search and booking tabs.

Returns:

Rendered dashboard template

Return type:

str

app.views.user_portal.search_buses()[source]

Search for buses matching the route criteria.

Returns:

JSON response with matching buses

Return type:

Response

app.views.user_portal.get_seats(bus_id)[source]

Get seat availability for a specific bus.

Parameters:

bus_id (str) – UUID of the bus

Returns:

JSON response with seat layout

Return type:

Response

app.views.user_portal.create_booking()[source]

Create a new booking for selected seats.

Returns:

JSON response with booking result

Return type:

Response

app.views.user_portal.get_bookings()[source]

Get all bookings for the current user.

Returns:

JSON response with user’s bookings

Return type:

Response

app.views.user_portal.get_booking_detail(booking_id)[source]

Get details of a specific booking.

Parameters:

booking_id (str) – UUID of the booking

Returns:

JSON response with booking details

Return type:

Response

app.views.user_portal.cancel_booking(booking_id)[source]

Cancel a specific booking.

Parameters:

booking_id (str) – UUID of the booking to cancel

Returns:

JSON response with cancellation result

Return type:

Response

Driver Portal View

Driver portal views for the BusFlow application.

This module defines the routes for the driver portal including viewing assigned buses and route information.

module:

app.views.driver_portal

app.views.driver_portal.dashboard()[source]

Render the driver dashboard with assigned buses.

Returns:

Rendered dashboard template

Return type:

str

app.views.driver_portal.get_assigned_buses()[source]

Get all buses assigned to the current driver.

Returns:

JSON response with assigned buses

Return type:

Response

app.views.driver_portal.get_bus_detail(bus_id)[source]

Get details of a specific assigned bus.

Parameters:

bus_id (str) – UUID of the bus

Returns:

JSON response with bus details

Return type:

Response

Admin Portal View

Admin portal views for the BusFlow application.

This module defines the routes for the administrator portal including fleet management, driver assignment, and driver creation.

module:

app.views.admin_portal

app.views.admin_portal.dashboard()[source]

Render the admin dashboard with fleet and user management.

Returns:

Rendered dashboard template

Return type:

str

app.views.admin_portal.get_all_buses()[source]

Get all buses in the fleet.

Returns:

JSON response with all buses

Return type:

Response

app.views.admin_portal.create_bus()[source]

Create a new bus in the fleet.

Returns:

JSON response with creation result

Return type:

Response

app.views.admin_portal.update_bus(bus_id)[source]

Update an existing bus.

Parameters:

bus_id (str) – UUID of the bus to update

Returns:

JSON response with update result

Return type:

Response

app.views.admin_portal.assign_driver(bus_id)[source]

Assign a driver to a bus.

Parameters:

bus_id (str) – UUID of the bus

Returns:

JSON response with assignment result

Return type:

Response

app.views.admin_portal.get_all_drivers()[source]

Get all drivers in the system.

Returns:

JSON response with all drivers

Return type:

Response

app.views.admin_portal.create_driver()[source]

Create a new driver account.

Returns:

JSON response with creation result

Return type:

Response

app.views.admin_portal.get_unassigned_buses()[source]

Get all buses without assigned drivers.

Returns:

JSON response with unassigned buses

Return type:

Response
